objects.specification: A large rectangular floor panel measuring ten meters in width along the X-axis and six meters in depth along the Z-axis, with a neutral light gray finish to highlight exhibited items. The surface is flat and smooth, suitable as an exhibition platform, with minimal thickness for stability. It features a lightly textured matte appearance to prevent glare under spotlights.

Four vertical wall segments each standing three meters tall with a thickness of twenty centimeters and a clean matte white finish. They form an enclosed perimeter of the booth with a central entrance gap in the northern side. The walls have sharp rectangular profiles and uniform surfaces.

A sleek modern demo car model approximately four and a half meters long and two meters wide, finished in a metallic silver hue with high reflectivity and a subtle brushed metal texture. It features aerodynamic contours, detailed wheel rims, tinted windows, and stylized headlights. The paint has a glossy finish with realistic reflections.

A rectangular reception desk roughly two meters wide, one meter deep, and one meter high, finished in a rich glossy red color. The desk has clean modern lines, a flat top surface for brochures and a recessed leg space below. The surface is smooth lacquer with subtle bevel edges.

A tall vertical rectangular banner measuring one meter in width and two meters in height, printed on lightweight fabric stretched over a slim support frame. The banner features bold car-themed graphics in red and black with crisp typography. The surface is matte to avoid glare.

A cubic display stand one meter square and one meter tall, with a flat top surface for informational placards. Constructed from sturdy material with a neutral gray matte finish. The edges are sharp and clean, and surfaces are smooth.

children.specification: A round table one meter in diameter with a flat circular tabletop and a cylindrical pedestal base. Finished in a dark brown wood tone with a subtle grain texture and slight sheen. Table height is approximately ten centimeters.

A simple visitor chair with a half-meter square seat and square backrest, supported by four straight legs, finished in dark brown wood with a subtle grain texture. Seat height is approximately one meter.

objects.specification: A slim cylindrical spotlight suspended from above, with a slender circular body in a metallic finish. It houses a focused directional light beam pointing downward with a thirty-degree cone angle. The fixture is compact and designed for precise accent lighting on the demo car.
A small potted plant with a cylindrical pot half a meter in diameter and one meter tall, painted green. The plant features simple frond-like foliage arranged at the top and has a matte finish.
